long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Companion extension for Valosan app. Enables full set of Media relationship management capabilities in Gmail. 

## Features

- See information about PR campaigns 
- See information about contacts, tweets and articles
- Send e-mails using pitch and press-release templates (mail merge)
- Update contact status
- Record outgoing and incoming e-mails
- Record open analytics in Valosan

All communication are performed only if you have active subscription to Valosan app and agree to privacy agreement and terms of service for Valosan app and extension.

## Permissions asked

- Access your data for sites in the googleusercontent.com domain - used only for blocking image links generated by extension itself
- Access your data for mail.google.com - adds extension pane in Gmail and allows you access data from Valosan app.
